txt.en: Hoshkhor has become known to the gathered forces of Gabil'akkâ. This foul creature has routed several patrols throughout the area and has hindered supply lines for the war effort.
Hoshkhor has become known to the gathered forces of Gabil'akkâ. This foul creature has routed several patrols throughout the area and has hindered supply lines for the war effort.
Hoshkhor, the Cruel Barb, has become known to the gathered forces of Gabil'akkâ. This foul creature has routed several patrols throughout the area, and has hindered supply lines for the war effort.
With the routing of Hoshkhor, the Gabil'akkâ should be able to secure the supply lines throughout the region.
Hoshkhor has been defeated for now

Hoshkhor has become a scourge throughout Elderslade. The Gabil'akkâ has learned to fear the creature as the field turns cold in its presence.

This foul creature has routed several patrols throughout the area and has hindered supply lines for the war effort. The troops have been beset time and time again.

You should seek out and defeat Hoskhor, the Cruel Barb.
Threats to the Battlefield: Hoshkhor, the Cruel Barb
Hoshkhor, has become known to the gathered forces of Gabil'akkâ. This foul captain has routed several patrols throughout the area and has hindered supply lines for the war effort.
